title: Sunset Trading Cloud Puff 3 Piece Performance Gray Grey 1` Slipcovered Modular Sectional Sofa, 132" Deep-Seating Down-Filled Couch
features: MODERN LOW PROFILE DEEP SEATING MODULAR SOFA – You may never want to get up from this super comfortable sectional that includes two corner modular pieces, two throw pillows and one armless chair section | Extra pieces available to form any shape or size sofa to fit your space | Additional slipcovers in a variety of colors can be purchased separately to instantly change your room vibe

WASHABLE PERFORMANCE FABRIC SECTIONAL COUCH – Entirely removable slipcovers (yes, even frame cover) with heavy duty soft spill proof dual performance fabric with scratch resistant tight weave | Each yarn is encapsulated with water and stain resistant protection eliminating the need for after-market spray treatments forever

BREATHABLE EASY TO CLEAN FABRIC – Spills bead up on the surface instead of penetrating into the cushion, yet air passes through for an extra degree of soft comfort | Swipe spills with a paper towel, machine washable in cold water, toss dry on low heat, spot clean with mild soap and water | Machine washable in cold water, toss dry on low heat, spot clean with mild soap and water, vacuum and fluff the cushions regularly

SAFE FOR YOUR FAMILY, BABY, KIDS, PETS & ENVIRONMENT - Using the same technology as water repellent clothing, if it’s safe to wear, it’s safe to sit on | Eco-tested for your well-being, does not contain any harmful chemicals, TB-117-2013 BHFTI Upholstered Furniture Flammability and CARB Compliant

REVERSIBLE REMOVABLE FEATHER DOWN CUSHIONS – Same fabric on both sides, all cushions are double stitched and can be flipped to minimize wear | Seat depth can be adjusted to your level of comfort by angling back cushions | To assure even back and seat support, comfortable and resilient feather down cushions are channel-sewn into several compartments and wrapped in an enclosed double layer feather-proof ticking lining | Cushion covers have heavy duty covered zippers for a seamless look | Frame cover secured with hook and loop fasteners that fold under the bottom of the frames

DURABLE FAMILY ROOM FURNITURE - Pocket spring construction: Sixty steel bands with nylon webbing encased in varying compression 1.8 density foam make the foundation as comfortable as a bed | Frame constructed from select hardwood with strong corner block joinery kiln-dried to remove moisture and prevent cracks or warps | Hidden neutral finish 1.5” round solid wood feet with nylon floor protectors

IDEAL FOR OPEN SPACE LIVING ROOMS – For maximum comfort, top 8 inches of arms and back frames are firmly formed with 1.8 density memory foam encased in a muslin cover | Finished padded upholstery on all sides, allows for use as standalone accent chairs or switch configuration from left arm facing to right arm facing | Heavy duty U clips included to attach pieces

FREE FABRIC SAMPLES & LIFETIME CUSTOMER SUPPORT – Slate gray color adds a modern edge and contemporary flair | Simply email info@sunsettrading.com | Our professional customer care team located in the USA since 1992 is ready to answer your questions before and after your purchase at any time

DIMENSIONS: CORNER WEDGE CHAIR (2) – WITH cushions: 36"H x 44"D x 44"W; Seat: 20"H | WITHOUT cushions: Frame: 24"H x 44"D x 44"W; Arm/Back: 12"H x 9"D; Seat: 12”H x 36"D x 36"W | Back and arm cushions (2): 24"H x 36"W x 8”D | Seat cushion: 8”H x 36"D x 36"W | Throw pillow (2): 24"H x 6"D x 24"W | Weight: 112 lbs. | ARMLESS CHAIR (1): WITH cushions: 36"H x 44"D x 44"W; Seat: 20"H | WITHOUT cushions: Frame: 24"H x 44"D x 44"W; Seat 12”H x 36”D x 36”W; Back: 12”H | Back cushion: 24"H x 46"W x 8”D | Seat cushion: 8”H x 36"D x 44"W | Weight: 94 lbs.| All pieces have four 1.5"H rounded straight wood feet with floor protectors

HOW YOU WILL RECEIVE YOUR FURNITURE - Slipcovers are not on the frames and are shipped in the same carton. Feet and connectors are in a zippered compartment under the frame, simply screw feet in and place slipcovers on frame and cushions and enjoy| Studio photography lighting, slight measurement and weight variances are possible, your viewing device may display colors differently than in real life
description: This contemporary modular sofa sectional is truly as comfortable as it looks. Enjoy unbelievably plush and cozy cloud-like comfort in your home, loft, office, or apartment with this cool configurable sectional. Perfect if you have a busy household, dogs, cats, children and parties, unexpected spills will roll off the washable soft pet-friendly and kid-proof performance fabric slipcovers. Changeable fabric slipcovers are available to completely update your living room vibe in a flash. Oversized seat and back cushions stuffed with goose down feather blend make this large deep-seating couch perfect for curling up in while the memory foam low frames are ideal to place in the center of your open space furniture arrangement. Feel free to sit on comfortable arms and backs, they go right back to the curved arm shape. So versatile, instead of a futon in your family room, dorm, spare bedroom or home office, feather pillow top seating supported by inner springs make this as cozy as a bed. Build your own left facing or right facing modular sofa, L-shaped couch, U-shaped or box pitt sofa, infinite configurations are possible. By adding additional corner modular pieces, armless modular chairs, and ottomans, all sold separately, you can create the ultimate laidback lounge that conforms to your room. This collection is simply the best family room furniture ever!
